text: 2004–05 Polish Volleyball League was the 69th season of Polish Championship (5th season as professional league) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). Resovia and Górnik Radlin were promoted to Polish Volleyball League in this season. In season 2004/2005 Jastrzębski Węgiel and Polska Energia Sosnowiec played in CEV Champions League, BOT Skra Bełchatów, Pamapol AZS Częstochowa and PZU AZS Olsztyn played in CEV Challenge Cup. BOT Skra Bełchatów achieved 1st title of Polish Champion. ==Play–offs== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2005–06 CEV Champions League |- |width=10px bgcolor=#bbebff| ||Qualified for the 2005–06 CEV Top Teams Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#e6f8ff| ||Qualified for the 2005–06 CEV Challenge Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFE7E7| ||Play-offs with the 2nd team of 1st league |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFCCCC| ||Relegation to the 1st league |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|BOT Skra Bełchatów |- bgcolor=#bbebff | |align=left|PZU AZS Olsztyn |- bgcolor=#bbebff | |align=left|Pamapol AZS Częstochowa |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff |4 |align=left|Jastrzębski Węgiel |- |5 |align=left|Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn- Koźle |- |6 |align=left|AZS Politechnika Warszawska |- |7 |align=left|Resovia |- |8 |align=left|Polska Energia Sosnowiec |- bgcolor=#FFE7E7 |9 |align=left|AZS PWSZ Nysa |- bgcolor=#FFCCCC |10 |align=left|Górnik Radlin |- |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !2005 Polish Champions |- |BOT Skra Bełchatów 1st title |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |Vladimir Kastornov, Mariusz Wlazły, Piotr Gruszka, Damian Dacewicz, Andrzej Stelmach, Krzysztof Ignaczak, Dariusz Szulik, Robert Milczarek, Paweł Maciejewicz, Radosław Wnuk, Bartłomiej Neroj, Michał Chadała, Robert Szczerbaniuk |- |Head Coach |- |Ireneusz Mazur |} ==References== Category:Polish Championship of men's volleyball seasons
